1.「おお <pc>殿。| 遠い所を呼びつけて すまなかった。| さあ こちらへ。: Oh <pc>. I'm sorry to call you|from so far away. Please come this way.

|of Dorworm immediately and capture the|kidnappers.

137.「はっ！ 先日より 開始されました| ジュレイダ連塔遺跡の調査にて| 石版がひと: Ha! A stone tablet has been discovered in the|survey of the Jureida Ruins that began the|other day.

138.「鑑定の結果 その素材は 未知の物と判明。| さらには 次のような文面が| 表面: The material was found to be an unknown one.|Furthermore, the following text was inscribed|on the surface.

140.「ヴェリナード王家の者のみが 開放しうる扉。| その向こうに ひとつのツボが眠る:
A door that only members of the Verinado royal|family can open. Beyond it lies a single urn.|It is a crimson jar in which a great fear is|
|sealed.

141.「大いなる恐怖は やがて 目を覚まし| すべての島が 海のもくずと化すであろう。: A great terror will soon awaken and all the|islands will be reduced to scraps of the sea.|The time has come for Wena's history to end.

142.「ふむ。何かの警告のようだが……。| まさか その遺跡に バサグランデのような|: Hmmm. Sounds like some kind of warning... Are|you suggesting that a mighty demon like|Basagrande is sleeping in those ruins?

143.「確証はないであります。| しかし 遺跡の中には 多くのしかけがあり| 奥へ進む: There is no proof. However, there are many|devices in the ruins that make it difficult to|go deeper...

144.「王家の者にしか 開けられない扉も| あるとのことなので それ以上の調査ができず:
I was told that there are doors that can only|be opened by royal family members, so I could|not investigate further and came here to|
|report.

145.「なるほど。確証はないが| さりとて 捨て置くわけにもいかぬ……か。: I see. I have no proof, but that doesn't mean|I should leave it at that....

146.「この件は こちらで対応を決める。| それまで調査は 一時中断しておけ。| 報告: We will decide how to handle this matter.|Until then, suspend the investigation. Thank|you for your report, Mr. Errigo.

148.「母上！ これは 放ってはおけません。| 僕が 調査団を連れて 調査に行きます！: Mother! I cannot leave this alone. I will take|a team of investigators with me to|investigate!

149.「……ヒューザが行っても 扉は開かんよな？| だからといって その姿のオーディス:
...If Huza goes, the door won't open, right?|But that doesn't mean that if Odis in that|form goes, everyone will know about the shadow|
|warrior operation.

150.「僕とヒューザ君が 一緒に行けばいいのです。| そうすれば 何も問題はありません: Me and Mr. Huza should go together. Then|everything will be fine!

151.「しかし 石版に書かれた内容が本当で| 危険な魔物が封じられていたら なんとする:
But what if the tablet is true and dangerous|demons are sealed inside? And there is also|the matter of the bandit who is after the|
|royal family.

152.「父上。暴君バサグランデをも倒した英雄が| ここにいるのを お忘れですか？| <: Father. Have you forgotten that the heroes who|defeated even the tyrant Basagrande are here?|We can have <pc> come too!

153.「誘拐犯が 現れたんなら| そこで とっ捕まえちまえば 事件は解決。| こんな変: If the kidnappers show up, we just catch them|there and the case is closed. No more|disguises.

154.「封じられた魔物のほうも オレと| <pc>で 退治しちまえばいいしな。| 本当: I'm sure I and <pc> can get rid of|the demon that's been sealed away. If they|really exist....

155.「<pc>殿 行ってくれるか？| 本当に 遺跡に 魔物が封じられているなら| そ: <pc>Men, will you go? If there|really are demons sealed in the ruins, I would|like to ask you to eliminate them.

156.「お願いだ <pc>君。| 状況を知っている君にしか 頼めないんだ。| 僕たちも: Please <pc>. You're the only one|who knows what's going on. We'll be ready and|on our way to the ruins soon too!

158.「ワシは 女王のそばを| 離れるわけには いかんのでな……。| 頼んだぞ <pc: I can't leave the Queen's side... so I'm|counting on you, <pc>.

159.「おお <pc>君。よく来てくれた。| それじゃ さっそく……: Oh <pc>. Thanks for coming. Well|then, let's get on with it...

160.「君は 僕の護衛だろう？| 仕切るのは やめてもらおうか。: You're my bodyguard, right? You're my|bodyguard, aren't you?

162.「オーディス王子。| <pc>どのは 私も知っていますが| こちらの方は どなた: Prince Odis. I know <pc> too, but|who is this one?

163.「彼も 僕の護衛のひとりだ。| ウデも立つし 信頼できる男だから| 君たちは 心: He is one of my guards. He is a skilled and|trustworthy man, so you don't have to worry|about him.

164.「では 石版にあった 王家の者にしか| 開けられない扉とやらを 探すとしよう。|:
Now let's look for the door that can only be|opened by the royal family, which was|mentioned on the tablet. Eligo, investigator,|
|please show us the way.

165.「怪しい物には さわらぬようにして| ひととおり 遺跡内を見てまわりましたが|:
I took a look around the ruins, trying to|avoid touching anything suspicious, but I did|not find the door as described on the stone|
|tablet.

166.「ですが いくつかの鐘や 音叉らしきものが| 設置されているのは 確認したであり: However, I have confirmed that there are some|bells and tuning forks in the building. I|wonder if they are the key to something...

167.「僕たちは もう一度 遺跡を周ってみよう。| <pc>君は この辺りを調べてみて: We'll go around the ruins again.|<pc> check out this area.

168.「おおっ <cs_pchero>どの。| 遺跡のしかけを 解いてくれたのでありま: Oh <cs_pchero>. You have solved the|puzzle of the ruins. That's <cs_pchero>|for you!

169.「王族にしか 開けられない扉か……。| まずは 僕が試してみよう。: A door that only royalty can open... I'll try|it first.

171.「やはり この扉は 王族にしか| 開けなかったのでありますねっ。| これで 調査: After all, this door could only be opened by|royalty. Now we can continue our|investigation!

172.「……開いたんなら それで よしとするか。| では 中へ入ってみるとしよう。|: Well, if it's open, that's good enough for me.|Let's go inside. Everyone follow me.

173.「……エリーゴ調査員。| この部屋で まちがいないのか？: ...eligo investigator. Are you sure this is|the right room?

175.「……どうも おかしいな。| 魔物が封じられた 真紅のツボとやらは| どこに あ: ...Something's not right here. Where is this|crimson jar that the demons are sealed in...?

176.「そこかしこに からくりのようなものを| 作っていた名残が 見えますが| ツボと: Here and there you can see the remnants of a|karakuri-like structure, but I'm not sure I'd|call it a jar...

177.「それじゃ あの石版に書いてあった| 大いなる恐怖ってのは なんなんだ？: What was the great fear on that tablet, then?

179.「ま～た ひっかかったね。| このバカ王子！: You fell for it again, didn't you? You stupid|prince!

181.「わわわっ……忘れたっての！？| 私だよ。キャ・ス・ラ・ンっっっ！: Wow, wow, wow... you forgot! It's me. C'mon!

182.「気をつけろ。こいつは 僕をだまして| 暴君バサグランデを復活させた ずる賢い女:
Be careful. This is the cunning woman who|tricked me into resurrecting the tyrant|Basagrande. Where have you been running off|
|to...

183.「ん？ あんたなんかに| ずる賢い呼ばわりされる いわれはないよ。| この あり: Hmm? I don't deserve to be called cunning by|you. You common, handsome man!

184.「やっぱり あんたは ボンクラさ。| ウソの石版の言葉に だまされて| ノコノコ: You're a fool, after all. You were deceived by|the words on the lying tablet, and you just|walked right out!

185.「あの石版は ワナだったのか。| それじゃ あんたが| 王家の者を狙う 誘拐犯っ: The tablet was a trap. So you are the|kidnapper who is after the royal family?

186.「はっ 誘拐？ 何よ それ？| そんなの 知るもんか。: Kidnapping? What's that? I don't know anything|about that.

187.「私は ヘビ使いのダンナに 王子はバカだから| 単純なワナに引っかかりますって: I just told the snake charmer's husband that|the prince was stupid and would fall for a|simple trap. It was such an easy job.

189.「やはり お前で まちがいないな。| ウェディの王子よ。一緒に来てもらうぞ。: I knew it was you. Prince Weddy. You're coming|with us.

194.「<cs_pchero>君！ ここは| 君のチカラも 借りなきゃならないようだ。: <cs_pchero>! Looks like I'm going to have|to enlist your help here. Take this guy|down!!!!

195.「そっちは まかせるぜ <cs_pchero>。| オレたちは ヘビ男のほうを捕: We'll take care of that <cs_pchero>.|We'll get the snake man.

196.「<cs_pchero> 何してやがる。| お前が こいつの相手をしてくれねえと: <cs_pchero>What the hell are you doing?|You're gonna have to deal with this guy or|you'll never get the snake man!

197.「すまん <cs_pchero>君！| 君でなければ こいつの相手は難しそうだ。: Sorry <cs_pchero>! If it isn't you, this|guy is going to be hard to deal with. I'll|leave it to you!

199.「だが 目的は果たした。| ヴェリナードの王子は もらっていくぞ。: But I've served my purpose. I'll take the|prince of Verinado.

201.「ちょ……ヘビ使いのダンナ 私は？| まだ報酬も いただいてないんですけどっ！？: Wait...what about me, the snake charmer's|husband? I haven't even received my reward|yet!

205.「……女狐め。放っておくべきじゃなかった。| くそ……。必ず 捕まえてやるぞ……: ...you vixen. I shouldn't have left her alone.|Damn... I'm gonna get you...

207.「ま……まさか さらわれたのは 別人で| あなたが 本物の王子どのなのであります: Are you sure you are the real prince and not|the one who was kidnapped?

208.「……説明は 後だ。| 急いで ヴェリナード城に戻るぞ。| このことを 母上に伝: ...I'll explain later. Let's hurry back to|Verinard Castle. I have to tell Mother about|this...

210.「なるほど。あんたが 本物の誘拐犯か。| その女を使って オレたちを| うまく: I see. So you're the real kidnapper. You|thought you could use her to lure us out,|but...

211.「そいつは 逆だぜ。| あんたが出てくるのを 待ってたのは| こっちのほうなんだ: It's the other way around. We've been waiting|for you to come out!

212.<center>この世のものとは思えない|ヘタクソな歌声が 城下に響きわたった！: A bad singer's voice, out of this world,|echoed through the castle!<me_70>

213.<center>城の前に集まった人々は カオを見合わせ|何かを言いたそうにしなが: The people gathered in front of the castle|looked at each other and seemed to want to say|something, but went back to their own lives.

214.「グランゼドーラの王女に メギストリスの王子。| ３人目は ヴェリナードの王子か: A princess of Granzedora, a prince of|Megistris, and now a third prince of Verinado?|Next time I won't screw up...

215.「……ああ なんたることでしょう。| これほどオンチで これほどヒドい歌は| 今: Oh, my God! I've never heard a song so on and|so awful before!

216.「もはや 私の手には負えません！| あなたに歌を教えるのは 無理だと| 女王さま: It is no longer in my hands! Please tell|JoOusama that I cannot teach you to sing.

217.「……だから 言ったじゃねえか。| オレに 歌なんか 唄わせるから……。: That's why I told you. You made me sing...

218.「あの先生のことは どうでもいいが| さっきの魔物のことは 女王に伝えとこうぜ。:
I don't care what you say about that teacher,|but let's tell the queen about the demons you|saw earlier. You should come too|
|.

219.「最初は わしが その役を買って出たんだが| 王家に伝わるメイク術で カオは似せ:
At first, I took on the role, but the royal|family's inherited make-up techniques could|make me look like Kao, but they couldn't fake|
|my body shape.

220.「まいまいテイルも まみむめもっ。| はい どうぞ！: Mai-mai-tail and mamime-mame too. Here you go!

221.「なんと言われても| だめなんだよ 歌だけは……。: I don't care what they say.

222.「なるほどな……。| そいつは 案外 いい作戦かもしれねえぜ。: I see... That might be a better strategy than|I thought.

223.「……わらわは この国の王だ。| 息子の身だけを案じ 国を襲うかもしれぬ脅威を|: I am the king of this land. I cannot leave a|threat that may attack my country to the|safety of my son alone.

224.「身代わりとは いったい……。| どういうことなので ありますか？: What exactly do you mean by "substitute"?

225.「各国に派遣した 魔法戦士たちには| 警戒をおこたらぬよう 命令を出したところだ:
I have just ordered the magic warriors I have|dispatched to each country to be vigilant, but|we also want to take all possible|
|countermeasures.

226.「そういえば セーリアちゃん。| ワシがプレゼントした おしゃれなサンダルは|: Oh, by the way, Sehria. Are you still wearing|those stylish sandals I gave you?

227.「すみません……。| そういったものは 身につけないのが| 普通だったので 慣れ: I'm sorry... it's just that I'm not used to|not wearing such things...

228.「無理じいは よくありませんよ 父上。| セーリアが生まれた時代の文化は| おお: You should not be unreasonable, Father. The|culture of the time in which the Seria was|born should be respected!

229.「おやおや？ ワシの選んだサンダルを| セーリアには こっちのが似合うから～と|: Well, well, well? Who was it who made me|change the sandals I had chosen because they|looked better on her?

231.「あれは 王子が選んでくれたのですね。| おふたりとも 本当に ありがとう。|: That was the prince's choice. Thank you both|so much. And JoOusama, too.

232.「……ふたりには 黙っていたが| じつは わらわも セーリアに| その……ブーツ: I didn't tell either of you, but I gave her|those boots, too. I gave them to her as a|gift...

233.「こいつは おどろいた。| 我々は 似た者家族というわけだな。| わっはっはっは: I was surprised. I guess we are a family of|similarities. Ha-ha-ha!

234.「おそらく この扉の先に 石版に書かれていた| 恐怖を封じたツボがあると 思うの: Perhaps beyond this door is the pressure point|that sealed the fear that was written on the|tablet.
